thread.section_title: iTailor Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of iTailor | itailor.com
thread.title: garren saxby

author: garren saxby
title: garren saxby
text:
To start off I want to say WOW! I'm an everyday suit and tie guy so finding something that exceeds my expectations is rare.
The idea of spending any sort of money for an unseen product that is non-returnable makes you pause and be cautious about ordering. Don't pause, order! I used my measurements to create the best suit fit I've ever had. In my industry an expensive suit is not an option but wanting to look nice is still a priority. Finding a tailored suit for this price point and now of this quality is amazing. Truly better than expected.
To sum it up, I will be ordering another real soon. Took 5 weeks to arrive but it was worth it knowing it was made specially for me. I'm truly
